title: Who will win MVP, Cy Young and more? Our MLB award watch
content: We go inside the numbers as baseball's best players go head-to-head to close out the 2025 regular season.

title: Phillies' Schwarber 1st in NL to reach 50 homers
content: Philadelphia slugger Kyle Schwarber hit his 50th home run of the season, a three-run shot off reliever Justin Hagenman in the seventh inning that gave the Phillies a 7-1 lead en route to a comfortable 9-3 victory over the Mets.

title: Source: Jets cutting Gipson after costly fumble
content: The Jets are cutting Xavier Gipson after his costly kick return fumble during Sunday's loss to the Steelers, a source confirmed to ESPN.

title: Poch defends U.S. players: 'Criticize me,' not them
content: United States coach Mauricio Pochettino defended his players and said criticism of the team should be directed at him and not his roster after Tuesday's 2-0 victory over Japan at Lower.com Field in Columbus, Ohio.

title: Bouie gives Bama hoops 2nd top-50 commitment
content: Top-35 wing Tarris Bouie announced his commitment to Alabama on Wednesday, giving the Crimson Tide their second top-50 recruit of the week.

title: Storm edge Valkyries to snag final playoff spot
content: The Storm clinched the 20th postseason appearance in franchise history by holding off the Valkyries in a 74-73 win Tuesday night.

title: Yanks' relief collapses as Tigers reel off 9-run 7th
content: The Tigers turned a 2-2 game into a blowout, exploding for nine runs in the seventh inning to defeat the Yankees 12-2 on Tuesday night.

content: Weekly individual and composite rankings for each position in PPR and IDP formats, as well as Eric Karabell's superflex ranks.

content: Even though Rob Ryan hasn't coached college football in nearly 40 years, he has already acclimated to life in L.A.

title: Coaching carousel: Who are candidates to watch? Who's on the hot seat?
content: Who could be on the hot seat? Who are coaching candidates to watch? Our experts explain the current coaching landscape.

title: NFL execs predict the biggest award winners: Picks for MVP, best rookies, top comeback player, breakouts
content: Who will win MVP? Who will be the NFL's top rookies? Who is primed for a breakout? We asked execs and scouts for their picks.

title: Everything we're hearing for Week 2: Panic for the Dolphins? Big decision for the Giants?
content: Our insiders dove in on the aftermath of the Dolphins' disastrous opener, both New York QB situations and more.

title: Matchup rankings: Drake Maye, Ricky Pearsall stand out in Week 2
content: Matchups are the key to fantasy lineup decisions. Here are the most and least favorable for Week 2 at QB, RB, WR and TE.

title: Zendejas' starring role has come at the right time for himself and the USMNT
content: Just as things were beginning to look dire for Mauricio Pochettino's side, Alejandro Zendejas & Co. produced a display that has boosted optimism around the U.S. camp.

title: 'I felt alive again': Taking a look at No. 1 pick Cam Ward's NFL debut
content: Tennessee quarterback Cam Ward's debut didn't go as planned, but there were positives to take away from it.

title: WNBA awards tracker: Collier or Wilson for MVP? ESPN names its winners
content: Has A'ja Wilson done enough to unseat Napheesa Collier as the 2025 MVP favorite? We name our award winners.

title: Power Rankings: A new No. 1 -- and highlights for every team in final edition
content: The hottest team and the top team aren't the always same. See our final 1-13 as the regular season wraps.

title: MLB most exciting player bracket: Featuring the most electrifying star on all 30 teams
content: Witt or Judge? Ohtani or De La Cruz? We narrow the field -- with a rep from every team -- to one true must-watch player.

title: 'He talks a lot': Jayden Daniels, Brian Burns sound off on in-game trash talk
content: Burns noted that Daniels likes to talk on the field. Daniels pushed back on such a notion -- but not entirely.

title: NFL trade grades: Did the Eagles give up too much for Tank Bigsby?
content: The Eagles added some running back depth behind Saquon Barkley, but did they give up too much for Bigsby? We sized up the deal from both sides.

title: As difficulties mount at Man City, could this season be Guardiola's last?
content: Pep Guardiola's exit from Man City feels imminent and this season may be his last dance -- even if it means he can't go out on a high note.

title: How the new league phase format plays out
content: We're going to take you on a guided tour of the new UEFA Women's Champions League and show you how the draw and the format work.

title: The John Cena eras: From Ruthless Aggression to 17-time WWE champ
content: We highlight the key moments from Cena's remarkable 23-year career before he retires the jorts in December.

title: 'I have to win': How competition -- in everything -- drives Crawford ahead of Canelo fight
content: Terence Crawford doesn't like to lose at anything. From playing cards to video games, he's as competitive as it gets.

title: All you need to know about Saturday's fight
content: Andreas Hale explains why Canelo Alvarez and Terence Crawford are fighting, what it means for boxing and more.

title: New faces, new places: Ranking the top 14 newcomers for the 2025-26 NBA season
content: Coach Mike Brown, Kevin Durant, Myles Turner and others are ranked by who will be the most impactful on their new teams.

title: Bills' big comeback: Long live-betting odds and shift in MVP, Super Bowl futures
content: The fourth quarter of the Bills-Ravens had it all -- including bettors putting down huge amounts on high odds.

title: Should you bet on Mateer or Moore to win the Heisman?
content: As odds shift for the Heisman Trophy and national title, Pamela Maldonado explains how to bet each of them.

title: The strangely specific transfer obsessions of elite clubs, and what the summer window taught us about them
content: Every team has preferences when it comes to transfers ... but some are more surprising than others. What did we learn this summer about Real Madrid's, Arsenal's and other elite clubs' fixations?

title: Transfer rumors, news: Madrid eye move for Stuttgart's Stiller
content: Real Madrid are reportedly keeping tabs on a possible move for VfB Stuttgart midfielder Angelo Stiller.

title: 'Closest to war since WW2': Russian drones over Poland push Europe to brink
content: Tensions surged as Russian drones breached Polish airspace, prompting Warsaw to invoke NATO's Article 4 and scramble allied forces. Several drones were shot down, marking a significant escalation as it's the first time a NATO member engaged Russian objects within its territory.

title: iPhone buying guide 2025: iPhone 17 vs Air vs Pro ‚Äî Which should you buy?
content: Apple's iPhone 17 lineup marks one of the most significant shake-ups in recent iPhone history. Gone is the Plus model, replaced by something entirely new: the ultra-thin iPhone Air. Combined with refreshed standard and Pro models, you've got four distinct options, each with its own personality and purpose. Let's break down each model to help you make the right choice.

title: Nepal Gen Z protest: Who is Sushila Karki? Frontrunner to lead interim govt
content: Nepal's Gen Z protest movement, fueled by anger over corruption and a social media ban, has selected former Chief Justice Sushila Karki as its interim leader. Karki's neutrality and respected civic standing made her the preferred choice to represent the protesters in upcoming negotiations amidst violent unrest and curfews in Kathmandu.

title: Google tightens AI use: Coders face strict rules; external tools prohibited
content: Google is mandating its software engineers to exclusively use internal AI models for coding, driven by CEO Sundar Pichai's call for AI adoption to maintain competitiveness. Employees are expected to demonstrate AI proficiency, potentially influencing performance reviews and career advancement.

title: 'You don't arrest Voltaire': Decoding France's history of protests
content: ‚Äã‚ÄãThis September, Paris burned, Rennes saw a bus ablaze, trains were halted in the southwest, and riot police clashed with demonstrators under the banner of ‚ÄúBloquons Tout‚Äù‚Äîthe ‚ÄúBlock Everything‚Äù movement. Over 200 arrests on the first day, despite Macron deploying an astonishing 80,000 police nationwide. Interior Minister Bruno Retailleau accused the protestors of trying to create ‚Äúa climate of insurrection.‚Äù To which the French reply: Mais bien s√ªr.

title: Asia Cup: Confusion at toss! SKY mishap takes centre stage - What happened?
content: The Asia Cup 2025 began with a funny incident in Dubai as Suryakumar Yadav's toss confusion briefly overshadowed the start. After winning the toss, Suryakumar's delay in communicating the decision to UAE's captain led to a lighthearted moment. India chose to bowl first on a fresh pitch, while both teams revealed their playing XIs, ready to compete.

title: ‚ÄòAnti-corruption icon‚Äô: Balen seen as Nepal's next PM; tops country‚Äôs social media
content: Kathmandu Mayor Balen Shah, a popular rapper and anti-corruption advocate, is gaining prominence in Nepal's political landscape. His strong social media presence and urban reforms have resonated with young people. Balen's call for restraint during Gen Z protests and his past education in India further highlight his growing influence and potential future leadership role.

title: Asia Cup 2025: Sanju Samson in? Massive surprise for UAE game
content: Sanju Samson has secured his place in India's playing XI for their Asia Cup clash in Dubai, despite speculation surrounding Shubman Gill's return and Tilak Varma's presence. India has strategically bolstered their batting lineup by including Shivam Dube and surprisingly excluding Arshdeep Singh. India won the toss and chose to bowl first.

title: France unrest: Nearly 300 held; what triggered 'block everything' protests?
content: France is currently experiencing widespread protests fueled by public anger towards President Macron's government. Demonstrators clashed with police, blocked roads, and set fires in major cities, leading to over 200 arrests. The unrest stems from austerity measures and political instability, with unions and activists demanding change and further action is expected, raising concerns about continued disruption.

title: iPhone Air, 17, Pro & Pro Max launched: Key features, India price; all details
content: Apple unveiled its 2025 iPhone lineup, featuring the iPhone Air, iPhone 17, and Pro models. All boast 120Hz displays and 48MP Fusion cameras. The iPhone Air stands out as the thinnest model, while Pro versions see the return of aluminum frames. Pre-orders and India pricing were also announced.

title: Rohit Sharma practising for Australia tour? Truth behind viral video
content: A resurfaced video of Rohit Sharma practicing sparked speculation about his return, but it was confirmed as old footage from the 2025 IPL season. Despite concerns raised by a recent hospital visit, Sharma has cleared a fitness test and is set to join Virat Kohli in the ODI series against Australia, marking their return to international cricket after a break.

title: Phillies Karen story explained: What controversy reveals about the US mindset
content: In Miami, a Phillies-Marlins game took a turn when a fan, Drew Feltwell, caught a home run ball and gifted it to his son. A woman aggressively demanded the ball, leading Feltwell to surrender it to protect his child. The incident went viral, branding the woman as the ‚ÄúPhillies Karen.‚Äù Despite the backlash against her, Feltwell urged for kindness.

title: 'Pakistan captain can win smaller event like Asia Cup': Suryakumar warned of 'banana peel'
content: Astrologer Greenstone Lobo suggests predicting winners in smaller tournaments like the Asia Cup is more complex than forecasting World Cups due to the influence of captains' horoscopes. While India, led by Suryakumar Yadav, are favorites, Lobo highlights Pakistan's Salman Ali Agha as a strong contender, potentially making the Asia Cup a challenge for India.

title: PM Modi speaks to Meloni: Trade deal in focus; Ukraine conflict discussed
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni engaged in a phone conversation, reinforcing their dedication to strengthening the India-Italy Strategic Partnership. Discussions encompassed bilateral relations, trade collaborations, and pressing global matters, notably the conflict in Ukraine. Modi expressed gratitude for Italy's support in finalizing a mutually advantageous India-EU trade agreement and advancing connectivity through the IMEEC initiative.

title: Suhas Subramanyam: Indian-origin Congressman raises voice on hate crimes against Hindus S
content: Congressman Suhas Subramanyam has strongly condemned the recent hate crimes targeting Hindu temples in the US, citing incidents in Indiana and Utah as part of a disturbing trend. Speaking at Capitol Hill, the first Indian-American from Virginia called for a comprehensive response, including increased funding to protect religious institutions.

title: 'Phillies Karen' identified & fired after taking Harrison Bader home run ball from young fan
content: During a Phillies vs. Marlins game, Harrison Bader's home run ball was caught by Drew Feltwell, who gifted it to his son Lincoln. A woman demanded the ball, sparking outrage online and earning her the moniker "Phillies Karen." Despite mistaken identity claims involving Leslie-Ann Kravitz and Cheryl Richardson-Wagner, the woman's true identity remains unconfirmed.

title: MLB: Detroit Tigers executives hit with disturbing misconduct allegations
content: Since 2023, the Detroit Tigers organization faces scrutiny following misconduct allegations against at least eight men, including executives and broadcast partners. These allegations, reported by The Athletic, encompass offensive comments and physical confrontations within the workplace. The organization has yet to publicly address the situation, raising concerns about workplace culture and accountability.

title: Asia Cup 2025: Shoaib Akhtar drops bombshell; makes massive prediction on India
content: Team India is gearing up for the Asia Cup 2025, starting with a match against the UAE in Dubai. Shoaib Akhtar humorously highlighted India's strong squad, while Suryakumar Yadav emphasized the team's aggressive approach. All eyes are on the highly anticipated clash between India and Pakistan on September 14.

title: Arjun Tendulkar takes five-for in first match after engagement
content: Arjun Tendulkar marked his return to competitive cricket after seven months with a bang, securing a wicket on his first ball and achieving his first five-wicket haul of the season. Recently engaged to Saaniya Chandok, Arjun is balancing his personal milestones with his cricketing career.

title: 'If shedding blood ‚Ä¶': Gen Z shakes Nepal ‚Äì what do they want?
content: Nepal is witnessing violent protests led by its youth, triggered by a brief social media ban. The demonstrations, fueled by frustration over corruption and lack of opportunities, led to Prime Minister KP Sharma Oli's resignation. Protesters are demanding systemic change, including the dissolution of parliament and fresh elections. Despite Oli's departure, unrest continues, highlighting deep-seated discontent among Nepal's young population.

title: Navya Nanda meets Apple CEO; Karisma's kids get assets worth Rs 1900 crore: Top 5 news
content: The Kapur family inheritance battle intensifies as Sunjay Kapur's mother claims a portion of his estate, while Karisma Kapoor's children are said to have received a substantial amount. Elsewhere, Navya Naveli Nanda visits Apple's headquarters, and Prajakta Koli cancels her Nepal trip due to ongoing protests. Shwetha Menon advocates for fixed working hours on film sets.

title: ICC T20I Rankings: 3 Indians in Top 10 of both batters and bowlers list
content: India's strong T20I performance is highlighted in the latest ICC rankings, with three batters and three bowlers securing spots in the Top 10. Abhishek Sharma leads the batting chart, while Varun Chakravarthy spearheads the bowling attack. Hardik Pandya remains the top all-rounder, showcasing India's strength across all departments.

title: Kansas City Chiefs' 'heiress' Gracie Hunt shares family moments at Argentina's Iguazu Falls
content: Gracie Hunt shared her family's awe-inspiring trip to Argentina's Iguazu Falls on Instagram, capturing the majestic waterfalls, diverse wildlife, and serene golden hours. Her photos and heartfelt captions highlighted the spiritual connection with nature and the joy of shared family moments amidst the stunning scenery. The journey was a blend of adventure, reflection, and lasting memories.

title: Asia Cup 2025: Jitesh Sharma explains evolution of finishers in T20 cricket
content: Jitesh Sharma highlighted the adaptability needed for T20 finishers, noting the uncertainty they face compared to top-order batters. He argued that traditional matchup theories are outdated, as modern batters innovate against all bowlers. Sharma emphasised the responsibility finishers bear, especially during team collapses, requiring instinctive planning adjustments in today's dynamic T20 landscape.

title: 'India, China funding Russia's war': US envoy - more sanctions planned?
content: US Ambassador Matthew Whitaker claimed Russia's Ukraine operations are funded by oil sales to India, China, and Brazil, urging sanctions. India faces new tariffs amid accusations of benefiting from discounted Russian oil, which MEA has called unjustified. Despite tensions, Trump anticipates talks with Modi, signaling continued US-India dialogue on trade.

title: Why top European stars are choosing Saudi Pro League over Europe
content: Top footballers are leaving Europe for Saudi Arabia. And lured by huge salaries, long-term contracts, and the country‚Äôs Vision 2030 sports project, Cristiano Ronaldo‚Äôs move to Al Nassr started the trend. This is followed by Neymar, Karim Benzema, N‚ÄôGolo Kant√©, Roberto Firmino, and younger names like Gabri Veiga. The Saudi Pro League now competes for global attention with Europe‚Äôs best.

title: 'I'm not part of that': Magnus Carlsen calls World No. 2 Nakamura 'shameless'
content: Magnus Carlsen has commented on Hikaru Nakamura's approach to qualify for the Candidates Tournament. Carlsen finds Nakamura's strategy shameless but pragmatic. Nakamura is playing in smaller open events to gain rating points. He recently won the Iowa Open. This victory brings him closer to his goal. Some criticize his choice of tournaments.

title: Shocking! CPL cricketers robbed at gunpoint - details inside
content: In Barbados, two St Kitts and Nevis Patriots players and a CPL official were robbed at gunpoint after a late-night food stop. The incident, occurring just before 3 am, involved the theft of jewellery and valuables. Thankfully, no one was injured, and police are investigating after recovering a dropped weapon.

title: Why Aaron Rodgers 'hides' his marriage; private life revealed
content: Star quarterback Aaron Rodgers, now with the Pittsburgh Steelers, has confirmed his marriage to Brittani, a relationship he's kept intensely private. Unlike many athletes, Rodgers shields his personal life, especially his marriage, from the public eye. He emphasizes Brittani's preference for a quiet life and how this privacy allows him to focus on football, avoiding distractions.

title: UAE: Emirates ID renewal and replacement in one step, check key details
content: The UAE has simplified Emirates ID renewal and replacement for citizens through a new single-step process. Under the Zero Bureaucracy Programme, applicants now only submit a form and pay the fee, with validity auto-assigned based on age. The system removes non-essential fields and is accessible via the ICP website and app, streamlining the entire customer journey.

title: Gujarat HC moved for stay of Jolly LLB 3 over judiciary's depiction
content: The Gujarat High Court has received a petition seeking a stay on the release of 'Jolly LLB 3', alleging that certain dialogues in the teaser degrade the judiciary's dignity.

title: 'I‚Äôll go on strike if Jasprit Bumrah plays against UAE': Ajay Jadeja
content: Jasprit Bumrah's return for India's Asia Cup opener against the UAE has sparked debate over workload management, following his absence from recent England Tests. Ajay Jadeja questioned deploying Bumrah in a low-pressure game, while Irfan Pathan advocated for his consistent availability throughout the series. India faces a balancing act in ensuring Bumrah's sharpness for major tournaments without risking early burnout.

title: 'Not pursuing dollar alternative': CEA assures India's economic resilience
content: CEA Nageswaran clarified India's non-participation in initiatives to create an alternative to the US dollar, emphasizing the nation's economic resilience. Despite global trade tensions, India anticipates FY26 GDP growth in the 6.3‚Äì6.8 per cent range. Structural reforms, fiscal discipline, and a focus on innovation are key to India's continued economic stability and growth.

title: 'My first instinct was that people are losing lives': Dinesh Karthik on Bengaluru stampede
content: Royal Challengers Bengaluru's IPL victory parade turned tragic on June 4, 2025, as a stampede claimed 11 lives. RCB has pledged Rs 25 lakhs to each bereaved family through RCB Cares. Batting coach Dinesh Karthik expressed the team's shock and grief, highlighting the profound impact on celebrations. RCB commits to long-term support, honouring the fans' memory with compassion and unity.

title: 'Karisma Kapoor‚Äôs kids got assets worth Rs 1,900 crore?': Delhi HC asks Priya Kapur
content: Following Sunjay Kapur's death in June, a legal battle has erupted over his Rs 30,000 crore estate. Karisma Kapoor's children are challenging Sunjay's will in Delhi High Court, claiming their share. The court has directed Priya Kapur, Sunjay's widow, to disclose all assets. Sunjay's mother, Rani Kapur, also questions the will, alleging exclusion.

title: '100% tariff': Trump asks EU to impose higher duties on Russian oil buyers India, China
content: US reportedly considers increased tariffs on nations buying Russian oil, including India. Donald Trump suggests tariffs of 50-100% on buyers like China and India. Trump wants the EU to act alongside the US. Discussions involved US and EU officials, plus Ukraine's prime minister. This comes as Trump said he looked forward to speaking with PM Narendra Modi soon to resolve trade barriers.

title: Gold prices fall from record highs! Go below Rs 1.09 lakh - here‚Äôs why
content: Gold rate today: Gold prices experienced a downturn, falling below Rs 1.09 lakh per 10 grams in domestic futures trading after reaching record highs. Profit-taking and weaker international markets contributed to the decline.

title: Bihar polls: Tej Pratap tours brother Tejashwi‚Äôs constituency; barbs fly
content: A political rivalry simmers as Tej Pratap Yadav, Lalu Prasad's elder son, distributed flood relief in his brother Tejashwi's constituency, Raghopur. This action follows Tejashwi's visit, where he inquired about residents' well-being. Tej provided essential supplies and medical assistance, subtly criticizing Tejashwi for a perceived lack of engagement.

title: Data Science Centre opened in Tirupati
content: Centre is equipped with modern laboratory, digital classrooms and library resources, and is envisaged to become a hub for research, training and innovation in statistics, Machine Learning and Al

title: Will scrap privatisation deals on medical colleges upon coming to power, says YSRCP chief Jagan Mohan Reddy
content: He terms the NDA government‚Äôs move as ‚Äòpeak of scams‚Äô; he also accuses government of ‚Äòcrippling healthcare‚Äô by diluting the Aarogyasri scehme

title: State govt. to work with power supply firms to ensure seven hours electricity for pumpsets during day
content: Steps are being taken for the proper implementation of KUSUM-B and KUSUM-C schemes, says Minister George

title: Auto drivers hold huge rally in Ongole demanding ‚Çπ30,000 under ‚ÄòVahana Mitra‚Äô scheme
content: Reduce the import and export duties along with VAT imposed on diesel, as well as gas, which were increased by the Central and State governments, says AIRTWF

title: Maoist with ‚Çπ8 lakh bounty killed in encounter in Chhattisgarh‚Äôs Kanker
content: Security forces recover rifle and walkie-talkie in anti-Naxal operation along Kanker-Narayanpur border

title: Manipur law to regulate SC, OBC certificates receives Presidential assent
content: The law was brought by then Chief Minister N. Biren Singh-led government in 2024, and is meant to ‚Äúprevent fraudulent cases‚Äù of people claiming caste status and to bring uniformity in the processes for issuing caste certificates

title: PM Modi speaks to Italian counterpart Meloni; discusses EU-India FTA, Ukraine conflict
content: In a phone conversation, both the leaders discussed ways to end the conflict in Ukraine as well as the implementation of the India-Middle East-Europe Economic Corridor

title: A.K. Singhal takes over as TTD Executive Officer
content: Terming it as a rare opportunity, he promises steps to increase the footfalls at the TTD temples across the country

title: ‚Çπ656.62 cr. crop insurance claims released for farmers in Kalaburagi, says Minister
content: The first installment of ‚Çπ364.70 crore has been transferred to farmers and, the Finance Department has released the balance ‚Çπ291.92 crore

title: GST hike on paper lottery: Finance Minister K.N. Balagopal holds talks with trade unions representing vendors, agents
content: Tax increase will affect ticket sales and impact livelihood of nearly 2 lakh people dependent on lottery sales, according to State government

title: Canada has Rejected 80% Of Indian Student Visas In 2025 So Far
content: Canada, long considered a preferred hub for international education, especially among Indians, has imposed its most restrictive visa regime in a decade.

title: Why France Is Protesting And What The "Block Everything" Movement Means
content: French President Emmanuel Macron has appointed Sebastien Lecornu as the country's fifth prime minister in less than two years, following the resignation of Francois Bayrou.

title: "Not Sparing Tourists": Indian Woman's Call For Help From Violence-Hit Nepal
content: An Indian woman has issued an urgent appeal for help and rescue amid violent Gen-Z protests that have claimed at least 21 lives.

title: 'If Not Proud Of Ayodhya Temple, Being Indian Doubtful': Yogi Adityanath
content: Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath on Wednesday said that if someone does not feel proud seeing the grand temple at Shri Ram Janmabhoomi in Ayodhya, then their being Indian itself is doubtful.

title: Extradition Proceedings Against Mehul Choksi In Belgium Likely To Begin Monday
content: The extradition proceeding against diamantaire Mehul Choksi, wanted in the Rs 13,000 crore Punjab National Bank fraud case, is likely to commence in a Belgian court next Monday.

title: Over 7,000 Prisoners Escape From Nepal Jails Amid Violent Protests
content: At least five juvenile inmates died during a clash with security personnel at a jail in western Nepal, while more than 7,000 prisoners escaped from different jails across the country during the violent anti-government protests.

title: 200 Telugu People Stranded In Nepal, Minister Nara Lokesh Monitoring Situation
content: Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu said as many as 200 Telugu people are stranded in riot-hit Nepal, and that Minister Nara Lokesh has been entrusted with monitoring real-time developments.

title: Punjab AAP MLA, 7 Others Convicted In 12-year-old Molestation Case
content: A court in Punjab's Tarn Taran district convicted AAP MLA from Khadoor Sahib, Manjinder Singh Lalpura, and seven others in connection with the molestation and assault of a woman in 2013.

title: Physiotherapists Are Not Medical Doctors, Cannot Use 'Dr' Prefix
content: The Directorate General of Health Services has issued a directive asking physiotherapists not to use the 'Dr.' prefix, as they are not medical doctors.

title: Guns, Crypto, 31-Year-Old Ambassador Car Among Assets Declared By Ministers
content: Cryptocurrency, decades-old two-wheelers, gold jewellery, mutual funds and agricultural land are among the assets declared by the members of the Council of Union Ministers for the year 2024-25.

title: Delhi To Microchip 1 Million Stray Dogs, Draft Rabies Action Plan
content: Days after the Supreme Court's ruling on stray dog management, Delhi's Animal Welfare Board held a crucial meeting on Wednesday, announcing plans to microchip one million street dogs, regulate pet shops, and launch a rabies action plan.

title: Supreme Court Criticises 'Piecemeal' Examination Of Rape Survivor
content: Taking exception to a rape survivor's "piecemeal" examination by a trial court in West Bengal, the Supreme Court has raised questions over her deposition being adjourned for four months.

title: "Karisma's Children Already Got 1,900 Crore": Sunjay Kapur's Wife In Court
content: The high-stakes battle over late industrialist Sunjay Kapur's approximately Rs 30,000 crore estate played out in a courtroom on Wednesday after his wife Priya Kapur challenged her stepchildren's plea seeking share in his personal assets.

title: "Containing, Deterring, Interfering With China Futile": Chinese Minister To US
content: China's defence minister warned the United States that "containing, deterring, or interfering with China will be futile" in talks with his US counterpart on Wednesday, state broadcaster CCTV reported.

title: Seven UP Border Districts Put On High Alert Amid Nepal Crisis
content: Uttar Pradesh Director General of Police Rajeev Krishna said that security has been heightened in seven districts of the state bordering Nepal.

title: Karisma Kapoor's Children Have No Access To Sunjay Kapur's Assets: Sources
content: Bollywood actor Karisma Kapoor's children have no access to assets worth Rs 1,900 crore from their father's family trust, as claimed by Priya Sachdev Kapur, wife of late businessman Sunjay Kapur, sources said today.

title: Railways Releases Video Teaser Of Mizoram's Bairabi-Sairang Line Ahead Of Inauguration
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will inaugurate the 51.38-km Bairabi-Sairang railway line during his visit to Mizoram later this week.

title: Mumbai Redevelopment Project To Unlock Over 44,000 New Homes: Report
content: The current redevelopment projects in the Municipal Corporation of Greater Mumbai region would add a total of 44,277 new homes at a value of Rs 1,305 billion by 2030, a report said.

title: Row Over Cross-Voting Snowballs, Congress's Manish Tewari Calls For Probe
content: The allegations of cross voting at the Vice Presidential elections by Opposition MPs has now blown up into a full-fledged political row.

title: 40 Parties Declared Rs 2,532 Crore Income In Financial Year 23-24: Report
content: Around 40 regional political parties declared a combined income of Rs 2,532.09 crore in the financial year 2023-"24, with more than 70 per cent of their funds coming through electoral bonds, according to an analysis by a poll rights body.

title: How to win your league: Expert picks, backup plans and more
content: If you read only one fantasy hockey story, read this one: your guide to draft, play and win your league like an expert.

title: Defense tiers: The elite, the roster fillers and everyone in between
content: Make your fantasy hockey draft strategy easier with detailed defensemen tiers and a guide to the position.

title: Andhra Pradesh IT Minister Lokesh to visit London on Sept. 16 for roadshow on Partnership Summit
content: The summit is scheduled to be organised in Visakhapatnam on November 14 and 15, and the roadshow aims at bringing together industry leaders, investors, and policymakers to showcase Andhra Pradesh as an ideal investment destination

title: AIDSO stages protests in Kalaburagi, Ballari against NRI quota in govt. medical colleges
content: ‚ÄòBy setting aside seats for wealthy NRI students, the State govt. is shutting down doors on hundreds of deserving youth from working class families‚Äô

title: India in active dialogue with U.S. for free trade pact: Piyush Goyal
content: The Commerce and Industry Minister said that negotiations are going on with the European Union and New Zealand for concluding a trade agreement

title: Export price fixed at ‚Çπ8 a kg for top-grade papaya in Annamayya district
content: New price to be in effect from September 10; decision taken to curb price manipulation by traders and middlemen, and to ensure farmers receive a fair return on their produce, says Collector

title: Maddur clash: DCM accuses BJP of indulging in ‚Äòdivisive politics‚Äô
content: They [the BJP leaders] don‚Äôt have any job other than indulging in politics, dividing people and inciting fire. They have nothing else to do, he says

title: Bihar seat-sharing must balance winnable and tough constituencies, says Congress
content: Party asserts all mahagathbandhan allies in Bihar should contribute from their ‚Äòkitty‚Äô to accommodate new partners

title: Our slogan ‚ÄòVote chor, gaddi chhod‚Äô being proved across country: Rahul Gandhi
content: ‚ÄúWhen we investigated, we learnt that nearly one crore new voters had entered the election system after the Lok Sabha elections. Our and our allies‚Äô votes remained the same, but all the new votes went to the BJP‚Äù

title: Probe into pension fraud in Kottayam municipality gathers momentum

title: Italy now have a potent attack, but what's happened to their defending?

title: NFL says Carter's ejection serves as suspension
content: the Philadelphia Eagles star will not miss any future games for spitting on quarterback dak Prescott . the league would consider the second-year defensive tackle to have served a one-game suspension . this is an important distinction by the NFL, which establishes a precedent . he will forfeit his week 1 game check worth $57,222 .
